title: iduvE enadu sucaritram
sahitya:
iduvE enadu sucaritram inba tunbamillA iyarkkai cittiram


anupallavi

  edu vEdam Odum podu brahmmamO adu tAn amaran Ananda shuddhan


caraNam    pirandadum illai irandadum illai peTrizhandu tunbam uTradum ilaiyE
uravenrum illai pirar enrum illai uDal ennuDaiyAm ulagen kuTilAm
